summary: Changes the normal 3 days per moon phase to only 1 day! Enjoy that full moon every 8 days!
descriptionHtml:
Changes the normal 3 days per moon phase to only 1 day! Enjoy that full moon every 8 days!

Install-
Unpack to your data folder or just use NMM.

Uninstall-
delete \'1 Day Moon Phases.esp\'
